DOC.brief_summary: This phase I study evaluate safety tolerability repeat dos AZD0837 .
DOC.brief_title: AZD0837 Extended Release ( ER ) Japan Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Japanese subject age 20 45 year inclusive Acute illness ( include ongoing history liver disease ) , trauma surgical procedure within two week Visit 1 pre first dose Visit 2 Intake another investigational drug within 4 month Visit 1 pre first dose Visit 2 Blood donation and/or sample excess 200 mL whole blood within precede 4 week , 400 mL whole blood within precede 12 week and/or 1200 mL whole blood within precede 12 month , Visit 1 pre first dose Visit 2
